Hmm...what I did was:

1. Install Game
2. Do Not Start Game
3. Put The Crack In 
C:\Program Files\Crimsonland
C:\Program Files x86\Crimsonland (For Vista 64)
4. Run The Crack And Find Grim.dll
5. If It Says Successful Then It Should Work.
6. If It Didn't, Uninstall Game
7. Redownload This Torrent Also And Repeat 1-5

Tested On 
Windows XP Home SP2 32-Bit
Windows Vista Ultimate 32-Bit
